description: Human technology is changing, and the human mind is changing with it. Working robots have displaced human jobs and changed the nature of our workplace activities and relationships. Social media has allowed us to connect with and debate groups from across the globe. Algorithms determine what we watch, who we listen to, and what services we access. title: Psychology of Technology
